text:
@senatemajldr @LindseyGrahamSC 93K innocent Americans are dead and THIS is how you waste your and our time?  Are we going to rehash Hillary's emails too?  

The least you could do is pass legislation for the Donald Trump Covid-19 Memorial. We need a place to mourn and a statue of Trump to spit on.
